message: Welcome! Our current product offering comes with a unique opportunity. Given the nature of our inventory, we maintain a 50% chance of presenting either a high-quality or a low-quality item. This round, we've got a low-quality product for you. While its value might seem minimal at face value, it's part of our diverse selection aimed at exploring various market responses. Considering our commitment to transparency, rest assured that every transaction is final and non-refundable. If you're intrigued by the challenge of potentially unlocking higher value through your discernment, this could be an interesting experiment. Remember, the price is set at $10000, reflecting our best estimate of its worth. Would you like to proceed with this purchase?
